DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the development of anti-drug antibody to biosimilar CT-P13 and to assess the change of drug concentration for 1 year in patients with moderately to severe inflammatory bowel disease.
DOC.brief_title: Anti CT-P13 Antibody in Moderate to Severe Inflammatory Bowel Disease
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of Crohn's disease or ulcerative colitis Tuberculosis infection Allergy to CTP13
